Articles.Content: Post your condolences here.
Horrid place ~ glad to see the back of it.
Let's all hope that all the projects will come back from the dead to join curse.

I'm gonna miss it... mostly because some projects won't get moved to Curse.

above: "Never would you find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy" is the quote you were looking for.
Yeah, Spaceport itself isn't what really matters, as the abandonware mods.

Farewell spaceport!

And we thank you.
All those old mods will be deleted. I've seen SpacePort since I first played KSP (the featured mods never actually changed) and it's sad to see those old mods go...

Like many others I do not like Curse one bit, but the spaceport was a mess... Mod titles not updating so you didnt know which one was the real thing, mod search was completely broken as it would display a lot of unrelated stuff often through several pages, long outdated mods still showing up all the time... I hope modders stick with github/mediafire/dropbox/etc

Space Port's going down?!?!? D:

QUICK! Download ALL the things!

Well, I was happy to hear that we were getting a new download system, like an idiot I assumed it would be better.

What we got was the aptly named "Curse" so now I miss the spaceport
Couldn't care less.

Ah, SpacePort.

SpacePort, Spaceport.

A love-hate-grr->_> relationship

Some shall miss you, some shall weep for you, some shall laugh at you.

You were choked full of problems, you made us anger, you had your faults, but we must remember one thing:

We still loved you.

Kerbals have their faults too, but we still can be loved.

We get angry, sad, joyous, passionate, amazing, evil.

Even with these faults, we are loved by the others in our community.

So remember, young Kerbals, the faults make us stronger.

So endeth a chronicle, and begineth a new.

So long, SpacePort. May you live forever in our hearts.

-solohobo, 2014
RIP Spaceport.
May God bless the Spaceport in heaven.

(In extremely suspisious accent) : Spaceport wasn't very good.

*walks in a corner* *sobs quietly*

Couldn't care less.

Blackhearted....

RIP B9 Aerospace...

Unless someone can find a way to re-distribute it without breaking any rules...

RIP B9 Aerospace...

Unless someone can find a way to re-distribute it without breaking any rules...

Oh crap... It got serious... *Hands everyone pitchforks and torches*

Oh crap... It got serious... *Hands everyone pitchforks and torches*

I'm downloading it right now. I'll stay here until it gets all the way downloaded. I suggest everyone do the same.

Idea: Curse owns Spaceport! So that Spaceport is still a thing.

Also... I don't like B9.... At all..... www.youtube.com/watch?v=_wk-jT9rn-8
Good news, B9 has a mirror on Mediafire! Just go to the thread (google search) and click the link below the spaceport link!

Is there a date set for when spaceport will be no more?

I'm not going to miss it itself, but its' many old and no longer maintained mods will be a loss. Glad I've kept copies of everything I've DL'd!
May 30th AKA tomorrow
Spaceport was crap, get over it.
spaceport, your data maybe missed.. I pray all learn from its many flaws.
